meanings.definition: to fix or mend something that is broken or damaged
meanings.sent1: I will repair my bike after it got a flat tire.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will repair the car's engine tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: I tried to repair my broken umbrella with duct tape, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness helped repair the friendship that was damaged by a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent5: The skilled craftsman could repair any broken pottery with ease.

meanings.definition: the act of fixing or mending something that is broken or damaged
meanings.sent1: The repair of the leaky roof was completed before the storm.
meanings.sent2: The repair of the old bridge took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The repair of the broken vase turned into a fun family project.
meanings.sent4: The repair of the relationship between the two countries was a delicate process.
meanings.sent5: The repair of the torn book pages was done with care to preserve the text.
